projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing. The platform includes an admin dashboard for inventory management and analytics.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates
projects.longDescription: Developed a modern task management application with real-time collaboration features, drag-and-drop functionality, and team management capabilities. Features include project boards, time tracking, and notification system.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts
projects.longDescription: Created a beautiful weather dashboard that provides detailed weather information with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and weather alerts. Features include 7-day forecasts, weather animations, and data visualization.

projects.title: Blog CMS
projects.description: A headless CMS for blogs with markdown support and SEO optimization
projects.longDescription: Built a modern headless CMS specifically designed for blogs and content creators. Features include markdown editor, SEO optimization, image management, analytics dashboard, and multi-user support with role-based permissions.
